/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from the middle of the street, looking towards the left side of the frame. The street is flanked by buildings and trees on both sides, creating a corridor of urban life. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The trees, lush and green, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. On the right side of the street, two cars are parked, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall composition of the image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing.
